text:
The quality of light is amazing, and the design fits perfectly with my home decor. Highly recommend!

Great product! Energy-efficient and easy to install. The customer service team was helpful too! Look for
Irene!

Visited the shop to purchase all our sanitary items and was assisted by Irene. Her service was outstanding—friendly, patient, and very thorough in her explanations. We’re very happy with our purchase and wish the business continued success!
Visited the shop to purchase all our sanitary items and was assisted by Irene. Her service was exceptional—friendly, patient, and clear in her explanations. I highly recommend her!

Irene was very prompt in replying and sharing products specifications. She was patient when I went over the shop to choose and test out their lightings. She also assisted in requesting for official supplier's plumber when there's a problem with my installation. Prices are reasonable for their items and I recommend buyers to went down and have a look. Good job and thanks Irene!
I bought all my lightings, bathroom and kitchen fixtures from Lookz. Irene was very attentive and helpful. Thank you so much!
